PresentationRequest.title: Presentation Request
PresentationRequest.description: A user's request for a private presentation.

message.description: The message or inquiry from the user.

requestDateTime.description: The timestamp when the request was submitted.

/presentationRequests/{presentationReque.description: Stores all presentation requests submitted by users through the contact form. This collection acts as a secure dropbox, allowing public writes but denying any client-side reads, updates, or deletes to protect user privacy.
